meanings.definition: Covered with or characterized by papules.
meanings.sent1: Her skin looked papulous with all the small bumps.
meanings.sent2: The plant had a papulous texture, feeling rough to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The papulous surface of the cake made it look like a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The papulous ground seemed to be covered in miniature hills.
meanings.sent5: The papulous rash on his arm was red and raised, resembling tiny hills on a map.

meanings.definition: Resembling a papule in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The papulous growth on the tree looked like a small bump.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a papulous feel, similar to tiny raised bumps.
meanings.sent3: The papulous pattern on the wallpaper made it seem like a 3D design.
meanings.sent4: Her papulous skin felt like a series of small mounds.
meanings.sent5: The papulous texture of the rock made it rough and bumpy to the touch.
